page.title: 08Local Concerns In Painswick
page.content: The people in Painswick and district are very concerned for the environment and many oppose schemes which could spoil the lovely countryside or damage wildlife.These include local planning and the killing of badgers. People are also very concerned about the amount of traffic going through Painswick.We counted 32 cars, 6 vans, 6 lorries and 6 coaches in 5 minutes. Farming methods are also causing a great deal of concern in the block.Hedge removal to make fields bigger is taking away many sorts of natural habitat for wildlife.Crop _ spraying is also thought to be damaging wildlife. Painswick is famous for its carefully marked and well looked after footpaths which give easy access to the country_ side.Great care is taken to keep the village clean and tidy.
